#Installation

Dependencies

scMINER is depend on python3 and R, including three individual modules: scMINER R package, MICA and SJARACNe python package.

Local installation:

  • Install scMINER from github:
#install dev_tool first install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install_github("jyyulab/scMINER") 
#or
devtools::install_local('scMINER_0.0.1.tar.gz')
  • Install MICA from source:
$ git clone https://github.com/jyyulab/MICA
$ cd MICA
$ python setup.py install
  • Install SJARACNe from source:
$ git clone https://github.com/jyyulab/SJARACNe
$ cd SJARACNe
$ python setup.py install
